mapper.sql:
select p.id, u.name userName, p.type, p.cost, p.medium, p.time, p.description, p.created, p.updated from (select * from payment
) p inner join user u on p.userid = u.id and u.deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into payment (userid, type, cost, medium, time, description) values (#{userId}, #{type}, #{cost}, #{medium}, #{time}, #{description})
mapper.update: update payment set userid = #{userId}, type = #{type}, cost = #{cost}, medium = #{medium}, time = #{time}, description = #{description}, updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id} and deleted = 0
